articles.title: Serial killer Charles 'The Serpent' Sobhraj released from Nepal prison after 20 years behind bars - ABC News

articles.title: Serial killer The Serpent, Charles Sobhraj, freed from Nepal jail - BBC
articles.description: Charles Sobhraj, convicted for killing two tourists in 1975, was suspected of several murders in Asia.
articles.content:
